default: ^This is the default knot, we should not be reading this in game
a: ^Good day to you, I brought you quite the rare artifact today, please take a look.
^They say stroking it gently with a cloth will grant you wishes...
^It might fetch a high price at auctions, if you're lucky.

c-0: ^Oh, absolutely. Look at me, don't I seem like someone who got everything they wished for?
c-1: ^Because every wish I made was granted... just not in ways I wanted.

b: ^Thank you for your offer... May it bring you better fortune than it brought me.
c: ^I’m sorry... I truly believe it deserves a higher price.
d: ^Your coin pouch seems rather light... not the best day for wish-making?
e: ^Maybe you're not as naive as I thought you would be... Good for you.
f: ^Surely you can do better? Artifacts like this don’t come around every day...
g: ^No, no, it’s not broken, nor is it lacking in magic... I can assure you of that! A shame you couldn’t see it.
i: ^You... saw it? I underestimated you. Take it... just get it far, far away from me.
